[Click to run](https://dataexplorer.azure.com/clusters/help/databases/Samples?)

```kql
let story64 = "";
print story64 
| extend storyun64 = base64_decode_tostring(story64)
| extend story = replace_string(storyun64,"||"," ")
| extend tokens = split(tostring(story),' ')
| mv-expand tokens
| serialize
| project tokens
| extend position = row_number()
| where position == 192 
    or position == 82
    or position == 315
    or position == 303
| extend index = iff(position==192,1,iff(position==82,2,iff(position==315,3,iff(position==303,4,0))))
| sort by index asc
| summarize DecodedMessage = strcat_array(make_list(tokens), " ")
| project DecodedMessage
```
